featured_recommended.reason: Ancient grammatical masterpiece (350 BCE) that influenced modern computer science (Chomsky, Backus-Naur). Cross-cultural intellectual impact. Exceptional technical depth.
featured_recommended.target_audience: Linguists, computer scientists, Sanskrit scholars, history of science enthusiasts

featured_recommended.reason: Rare pre-modern autobiography by Mughal Empire founder. Accessible narrative with historical significance. Beveridge's landmark translation.
featured_recommended.target_audience: History enthusiasts, South Asian studies, autobiography readers

featured_recommended.reason: Fourth Veda with medical, magical, and philosophical content. Foundation of Ayurveda. Embedded Upanishads. Modern relevance.
featured_recommended.target_audience: Vedic scholars, Ayurveda practitioners, philosophy students, religious studies

featured_recommended.reason: India's greatest poet (Shakespeare of India). Literary excellence with cultural impact. Influenced European Romanticism.
featured_recommended.target_audience: Literature enthusiasts, Sanskrit poetry readers, comparative literature scholars

featured_recommended.reason: Ancient Indian astronomy combining mathematical precision with cultural practice. Historical calendar science.
featured_recommended.target_audience: Astronomy history, cultural studies, Hindu calendar practitioners

notes.validation_methodology: Strict zero-tolerance policy on boilerplate phrases. Description scoring based on: proper nouns (2+), specific facts, technical terminology, zero forbidden phrases. Biography scoring based on: specific dates/places, achievements, historical context, substantive paragraphs (4+).
notes.strengths: 13 works demonstrate exceptional quality with zero boilerplate. 5 works qualify for featured status with scores 85-95. Strong technical depth in specialized subjects. Excellent biography quality in passing works.
notes.weaknesses: 3 works contain complete boilerplate (not enhanced). 9 works below 150-line minimum (though 5 have quality content). Several works below 10-section minimum. Reference count low in some works.
notes.overall_assessment: 81.25% pass rate exceeds expectations given strict criteria. Featured works demonstrate world-class quality suitable for homepage showcase. Conditional pass works acceptable for upload but should be enhanced. Failed works require complete regeneration.
